    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Cluster
    A Kubernetes cluster.
    Cluster.MaintenanceWindow
    The schedule for when maintenance activities may be performed on the cluster.
    Cluster.Node
    A worker node.
    Cluster.NodePool
    A pool of worker nodes.
    Cluster.NodePoolConfiguration
    The desired state of a NodePool.
    Cluster.NodeState
    The state of a node.
    Cluster.NodeStatus
    The status of a node.
    Cluster.State
    A cluster's state.
    Cluster.Status
    The status of a cluster.
    ClusterConfiguration
    The desired state of a Kubernetes cluster.
    CreateResult<T>
    The result of trying to create a resource.
    DigitalOceanClient
    A client of the DigitalOcean REST API.
    DockerCredentials
    Credentials for a docker registry.
    DockerImage
    A docker image.
    DockerImage.Layer
    A layer of the image.
    DockerRegistry
    A registry of docker repositories.
    DockerRepository
    A repository of docker images.
    Droplet
    A computer node.
    DropletCreator
    Creates a new droplet.
    DropletFeature
    Droplet features that are disabled by default.
    DropletImage
    The system image that was used to boot droplets.
    DropletMetadata
    Information about the droplet that the JVM is running in.
    DropletType
    Droplet types.
    KubernetesClusterNotFoundException
    Thrown if a referenced Kubernetes cluster could not be found.
    KubernetesVersion
    The version number of the Kubernetes software.
    PermissionDeniedException
    Thrown if the server rejects a request due to insufficient permissions.
    Region
    A geographical region that contains one or more datacenters.
    SshPublicKey
    An SSH public key that is registered with the account or team where they were created.
    Vpc
    A private network, otherwise known as a virtual private cloud (VPC).
    Zone
    A datacenter.
